about_the_game:
If you enjoy soundtrack of the Sex and the Furry Titty 3, this DLC is for you! You’ll be able to get all the original tracks from the stories.

The Furlough Games team is very grateful for your support and wants to thank you wholeheartedly! By purchasing this DLC you are helping us make more and better furry games!

content_descriptors.notes:
The main game contains scenes of male nudity and sex. 
There is no adult content in the Soundtracks.
